column3:
Please sort by second column

On Mar 7, 2018 09:33, "kallewoof" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> The docs require 2 sigs before merging, but I'm making the PR now so I
> don't forget about it.
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12631
> Commit Summary
>
>    - [gitian] Add k

@MarcoFalke it appears the current list sorting is somewhat inconsistent, why are some users sorted by first name and others by second? EDIT: It looks like they are implicitly sorted by github username rather than the actual names listed (e.g. fanquake)?
I alphabetized it. Will update title. Can revert if people think this should be separate.
@kallewoof Can you link the PR for your sigs you've submitted to the gitian sigs repo here as well.
